lead_paragraph: The British government said on Tuesday it was asking all national sporting governing bodies to increase their efforts to protect children, following allegations of young boys being sexually abused at professional soccer clubs.

headline.print_headline: UK Asks Sporting Bodies to Do More to Protect Children From Abuse
headline.main: UK Asks Sporting Bodies to Do More to Protect Children From Abuse

snippet: The British government said on Tuesday it was asking all national sporting governing bodies to increase their efforts to protect children, following allegations of young boys being sexually abused at professional soccer clubs....
